Surreal Five Stars Red Cliff International Version - Part I & Part II Tony Leung (Actor), Takeshi Kaneshiro (Actor), John Woo (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Drama ["Red Cliff, the epic historical drama based on a legendary 208 A.D. battle that heralded the end of the Han Dynasty. A power hungry Prime Minister-turned-General Cao Cao seeks permission from the Han dynasty Emperor to organize a southward-bound mission designed to crush the two troublesome warlords who stand in his way, Liu Bei and Sun Quan. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user maintains a strong passion for classic animation and artistic expressions in film, particularly from Slavic creators. They remain critical of films that do not meet their high standards for storytelling, and recent interactions suggest a more pronounced focus on quality presentation. Their latest review, highlighting disappointment in the visual quality of a purchase despite a favorable average rating, reflects their commitment to both narrative excellence and technical standards. 

While the user appreciates well-rounded films, they have expressed frustration over inadequate execution, reinforcing their belief that even strong performances cannot salvage poor-quality presentations. They favor physical media, particularly DVDs, valuing the tactile experience that enhances cinematic enjoyment, which further stresses their expectations for a complete and immersive viewing experience. 

Their ratings indicate a preference for emotionally impactful and artistically rich narratives, and they increasingly voice strong negative opinions about films or media that fail to resonate or meet their standards. The user exhibits a sophisticated understanding of narratives, favoring intellectually stimulating art, with a marked preference for global cinema over mainstream offerings. 

Overall, they possess discerning tastes for captivating, emotionally resonant films with high artistic standards, and their latest engagement reinforces their ongoing commitment to both narrative quality and technical excellence in cinema.
